.. _emulation_tools:

Emulation Tools
===============

``fv3fit.emulation`` contains a shared set of tools to help build and prototype ML models for emulation.  Currently this contains tooling around data handling :ref:`emulation_data`, and (in the future) layers for tensorflow models.
